name: Bosdon
culture_notes: Riveric dialect dominant; Coastal Tongue influences in trade speech
Funerary river rites and raised-house architecture
Diet heavy on smoked fish, riverweed, and preserved timber staples
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam megatechs
notes: Location: small river waypoint; population unknown
Often used as a transshipment node for inland timber and reagent cargo
State jurisdiction unclear; local powers fill the vacuum
